content: new arrival baby set crochet boy & girl edge trim versions included finished size newborn -- blanket approx 19 x 24 -- hat approx 11 circumference unstretched -- booties approx 3-1/2 long - mitts approx 3 long materials sport wt baby yarn - 1 skein 5 oz /140 g each color a color b color c -- sample set shown above is girl version worked in bernat softee baby pale green caron simply soft baby sport white lion brand jamie pompadour pink size h/8 5 mm & i/9 5 5 mm crochet hooks hat uses size h/8 5 mm hook blanket uses size i/9 5 5 mm hook 1-1/2 yds 1/4 satin ribbon tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge finished granny square measures 7-1/2 square with sport wt yarn on size i hook hat gauge 16 half_double_crochet = 4 3 row half_double_crochet = 1-1/4 with sport wt yarn on size h hook blanket granny square make 4 note for corner work 3 double_crochet-chain 2-3 double_crochet in same space 1 round 1 with size i hook and color a chain 4 join into ring or wind loop of yarn around finger and work over strands of loop to form beginning ring chain 3 work 2 double_crochet into ring chain 2 *work 3 double_crochet into ring chain 2 repeat from * twice join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 four 3-double_crochet groups with chain-2 between round 2 slip_stitch into space to right of joining chain 3 work 2 double_crochet in same space *in next space work 3 double_crochet-chain 2-3 double_crochet corner made repeat from * twice ending with 3 double_crochet in same space as beg 3-double_crochet group chain 2 join with slip_stitch round 3 slip_stitch into space to right of joining chain 3 work 2 double_crochet in same space *work 3 double_crochet in next space in next corner work 3 double_crochet-chain 2-3 double_crochet repeat from * around ending with 3 double_crochet in same space as beg 3-double_crochet group chain 2 join with slip_stitch fasten_off color a round 4 join color b in any corner space chain 3 work 2 double_crochet in same space *work 3 double_crochet in next space repeat from * across to next corner work corner in corner** repeat from * to ** around ending with 3 double_crochet in same space as beg 3-double_crochet group chain 2 join with slip_stitch round 5 slip_stitch into space to right of joining chain 3 work 2 double_crochet in same space *work 3 double_crochet in next space repeat from * across to next corner work corner in corner** repeat from * to ** around ending with 3 double_crochet in same space as beg 3-double_crochet group chain 2 join with slip_stitch round 6 repeat round 5 fasten_off color b round 7 join color c in any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space work double_crochet in ea double_crochet and corner around working 5 double_crochet in ea corner space and ending with 2 double_crochet in same space as beg chain-3 join with
